```{r}
# reading input 
df <- read.csv("perform_dist.csv", header =TRUE, sep=",")
df <- df[complete.cases(df), ]  
df
```

```{r}
df$group = factor(df$group)
df$log_abs_perform_diff_best <- log(df$abs_perform_diff_best + 1) 
df$group <- relevel(df$group, ref = "3")
```


```{r}
mod <- lm(log_abs_perform_diff_best ~ group, data = df)
summary(mod)
```
